description.brief: Flows that have not yet been elevated to the status common_flows

package.description: This is a place to put flows that are more general than the module that needs to use them, but havn't been tested thoroughly enough to put in common_flows. Depending on these flows is likely to break things since they are subject to refactoring and/or moving at any time.
package.author: Jeremy Leibs (email: leibs@willowgarage.com)
